name: readarr
description: Readarr is a self-hosted ebook and audiobook collection manager for Usenet and torrents. It integrates with Calibre, tracks authors, and automates downloads via indexers.
features: Author tracking: Monitor favorite authors and automatically download new releases when they're published.
Calibre integration: Sync with Calibre libraries to manage metadata and convert between ebook formats.
Quality profiles: Define preferred formats like EPUB, MOBI, or AZW3 and prioritize audiobook quality.
Automated downloads: Search Usenet and torrent indexers to grab books as soon as they become available.
Metadata management: Fetch book covers, descriptions, and publication details from GoodReads and other sources.
Series tracking: Follow book series and get notified when new installments are released.
Import lists: Automatically add books from GoodReads lists, reading challenges, or custom sources.
Library organization: Rename and sort downloaded books into a consistent folder structure.
Search indexers: Connect to multiple indexers simultaneously to find rare or hard-to-find titles.
Upgrade monitoring: Replace existing books with better quality versions or preferred formats when available.
Calendar view: See upcoming book releases from tracked authors on a visual timeline.
Notifications: Send alerts to Discord, Telegram, or email when new books are added or downloaded.
